name: Five Nights at Pancake's 1 for Android
name_original: Five Nights at Pancake's 1 for Android
description:
"i'm a pancake, i'm a pancake, dodododododododo i'm a pancake"

A FNaF fangame

This is an official port of Fnap 1 mobile (originally created by TheMasterBee and BJ Gaming) to Android. It takes some of the FNaF elements, makes it more goofy ahh and bam, pancake.

As you would think, this is just a scuffed version of Five Night's at Freddy's. But this version is quicker, has different lore and you can't die by getting the battery down. If you want the full Fnap experience, be sure to play the PC version!

More informations, including the original Fnap 1 mobile, Fnap 1, 2, 9, 10, the lore and many other original games are located on the official website.

2021-2023 Susgames Official. We are in no way affiliated with FNaF, Clickteam LLC or Innersloth. You should only be able to download this version of the game from this page or the GameJolt page and nowhere else.
